name: 1 Park Road

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with family
reviews.text: We (myself, my daughter and my mother) found 1 Park Road to be the perfect bed and breakfast. Philip met us at the station ,which we really appreciated, and pointed out restaurants we might like to try. His suggestions came in very handy. Mary and Philip made us feel very welcome throughout our stay and we particularly enjoyed the variety and quality of the breakfast provided. The cooked breakfast was delicious and the range of fruit dishes was like nothing we were offered anywhere else. Our room was lovely and very well appointed - everything was exactly as described on the website. Mary's offer to drive us to the station on the day we were leaving was a lovely final touch. Other reviewers have mentioned the 'extra mile' Mary and Philip often go to and here are two I was particularly grateful for: on our final morning, Mary took our daughter to see what I believe was a wonderful teddy bear collection - Mary even gave my daughter a knitted scarf for her teddy bear. My daughter was thrilled. Secondly, I left my camera charger in the room and it was posted back ASAP - I am very grateful. I plan to go back to Windermere for my 50th birthday and would definitely stay at 1 Park Road.
reviews.title: A Fabulous Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: If you're looking for a pet- friendly getaway break in Windermere, 1 Park Road is somewhere I'd highly recommend. Philip and Mary are so accommodating and are very knowledgeable about all things local (walks, dog- friendly pubs, etc). I'm really pleased that they allowed us to bring the dogs; Philip and Mary have all sorts of arrangements to allow for a comfortable stay for the 4- legged friends... they even have facilities to hose them down after a day of walking around in the rain and mud! Their dog is also very welcoming.
reviews.title: Will be back soon

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The whole place is warm, cosy and very comfortable, and they have a brilliant breakfast menu. It's definitely somewhere I'll be visiting again. Thank you both for your hospitality.
reviews.title: Just Right!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Home away from home. Philip & Mary were sociable, helpful and we enjoyed a good bit of banter. Philip & Mary couldn't do enough to help from offering to take us & pick us up from a restaurant, through sharing a CD of his favourite composer to a bespoke breakfast menu on my wife's birthday!
reviews.title: Comfortable Stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed November 2011
reviews.text: Room was lovely, breakfast a treat and the advice on local walks was spot-on. And the house dog was a friendly soul.
reviews.title: Great value and beautiful

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: From the moment you arrive the hosts Philip and Mary make you most welcome. The property is delightful, clean and very comfortable. The breakfast was excellent and nothing was to much trouble. Lots of little extras that make you feel cared for and special.
reviews.title: Home from Home

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Philip is a font of knowledge on the local area restraunts etc. and walks to take. I have paid a lot more and still did not receive the service and standard of accommodation that I experienced at 1 Park Road.
reviews.title: 50th Birthday Bash

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: What a fantastic trip! I booked this break for my partners 50th surprise party and invited 8 other guests to join us. From the outset Philip was extremely helpful, he offered advise on restaurants, spa hotels and just generally things to do in and around Windermere in January. Leading up to our stay Philip even gave us regular weather reports to help us better plan our stay! The rooms at 1 Park Road are good, the communal areas are great and breakfast is super! We really couldn't have asked for better service!
reviews.title: A perfect New Year

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: 1 Park Road was perfect. The B and B is gorgeous, warm, cosy and well eqiuped with books, paintings, instruments to keep well entertained (should the weather not be up to much). The accomodation is clean and modern, with lots of space to stretch out and make yourself comfortable. It truely feels like a home away from home. Phil and Mary go out of their way to make you feel welcomed, nothing is too much trouble. The breakfast is fab! Great selection of food, including eggs benedict. I cannot recommend staying here highly enough, there is definately nowhere else we;ll be staying when we come back to the lakes. Thank you for an amazing stay Mary and Phil. We're looking forward to staying with you again when we're back from the Caribbean. Nicole and Antony x
reviews.title: Excellent dog friendly B & B

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: My girlfriend and I stayed here between Christmas and New Year and were treated to wonderful hospitality courtesy of Philip and Mary. They were extremely welcoming to the both of us and our German Shepherd and provided everything we needed to make the stay for all 3 of us extremely comfortable. I have paid a lot of money for breakfasts in cafes in London but I can honestly that their full English breakfast is by the far the best I have ever eaten! Each of the locally sourced ingredients was absolutely bursting with flavour. I would thoroughly recommend this B & B for anyone looking for high quality, good value accommodation in the Lake District particularly if you are also bringing a canine friend.
reviews.title: Simply the best B & B we have ever stayed in

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We book in good time, then had to delay our break. The communication from Philip and Mary was excellent and re arranging our trip was simple. In the week before we headed north got very helpful email from Philip with menu's and weather. This level of service continued from the moment we arrived at 1 Park Road until the day we left. 3 night stay, Room excellent, service excellent, Breakfast ok !! only joking Philip, Breakfast Excellent. If you are a dog lover / owner then book this first rate bed and breakfast for a great break away.
reviews.title: A Great few days at 1 Park Road

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We friendly, relaxed and welcoming service from both your host Philip & Mary. We look forward to visiting the Lakes again sometime and we book 1 Park Road again.
reviews.title: Attention to Detail

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: As usual we left everything to the last minute and only booked 1 Park Road the night before we were leaving. We got an email from Philip confirming the booking and this was followed up by a call the next day as we were driving up. Both Peter and Mary is extremely welcoming and I think what makes 1 Park Road stand out for us is them and their attention to detail. From the cup of tea and cake on arrival, to the clean spacious rooms with all mod cons and great toilettries to the outstanding breakfast. That combined with a great location makes it a winner ! Thank you so much.
reviews.title: 1 Park Road - the Sequel!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our second visit to 1 Park Road and what a visit! We were welcomed back like old friends by Philip and Mary.
reviews.title: A wonderful, welcoming little gem of a hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2011, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Not sure what more we can add to our first review... we were lucky enough to have an upgrade to a luxury double. Large and comfortable, with every mod-con, the room was decorated in Mary's delightful taste. All the facilities were present as before - ipod docking stations, DVD players (with DVD's) and flat screen TV and a real coffee maker, Lakeland tea and fresh milk. It was lovely and warm with radiators that we could control ourselves. The small shower room was stocked with stylish toiletries, plenty of towels and bathrobes.
reviews.title: outstanding hospitality

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Just back from a two night stay at 1 Park Road, Windermere. Very clean and comfortable bedroom, tastefully furnished residents lounge, pre and post dinner drinks served (in generous measures!), freshly cooked evening meal chosen from a menu emailed in advance, excellent breakfast, hospitable and entertaining hosts. Doubtful whether you will get better value for your money in the area. 100% recommended.
reviews.title: Just Great Value For Money!!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We received a real welcome on arrival, not to mention coffee and cake. Lovely room, clean, comfy and homely. Superb breakfast. Phillip and Mary are wonderful hosts, easy to be with and good to chat to.
reviews.title: Great accommodation, great breakfast, great welcome, great to go back to.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Really cant wait to return. It was going to be next year but we are trying to fit 2 more breaks in this year now! Hope they ll have us!
reviews.title: Super Friendly, Super Breakfasts!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012
reviews.text: Very friendly welcome from Mary who had tea & cake waiting for after we had unpacked.
reviews.title: Warm, welcoming and comfy.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed February 2012, traveled with friends
reviews.text: Superb breakfasts with a good choice of options to suit all tastes that kept us going for the day.
reviews.title: Welcoming and Friendly

description: 1 Park Road is an award-winning luxury contemporary accommodation in the heart of Windermere village. A recently refurbished former gentleman's residence that has a wonderful laid-back feel. 6 Spacious ensuite rooms with comfortable beds- three with kng sized beds, flat screened TV's, DVD and Ipod docking stations. All rooms have The White Company soaps, white robes and lotions from Pure Company and proper fresh coffee and fresh milk- very important. We are fully licensed with an interesting selection of wines and bottled beers from around the world. We offer freshley cooked dinners at week ends and either cold meator cheese platters the rest of the week- subject to availability.
